sentences.cn: …一位身价数千万的船业巨头。

sentences.en: A multimillionaire media magnate has shocked his employees with his candor by telling them all that he's putting his business affairs on hold to enter an alcoholism - counseling program.
sentences.cn: 一位身份数百万的媒体大亨,坦诚地告诉他全体员工他将暂时搁置他的事业以便参加戒酒班,令员工大为惊愕.

sentences.en: A wealthy and powerful businessperson or industrialist; a magnate.
sentences.cn: 巨头富有的、强有力的商人或工业家; 大亨.

sentences.en: Argentinian oil magnate to let them work on his rig.
sentences.cn: 当油井老板神秘失踪后,他的一名工人吉拉多就接手了公司的管理.

sentences.en: Boss Chen, is only my magnate in the end.
sentences.cn: 陈老板, 终究只是我的贵人吧!

sentences.en: Despite rumors, he wasn? t related to steel magnate Andrew Carnegie.
sentences.cn: 尽管有传闻, 他和钢铁巨头安德鲁卡耐基并无亲缘关系.

sentences.en: Her family was a famous petroleum magnate in Texas.
sentences.cn: 她的家族是德州有名的石油大亨,拥有庞大的牧场.

sentences.en: Mcdonald's group is the magnate in the sack industry of the world.
sentences.cn: 麦当劳 集团是全球快餐业巨头.

sentences.en: Of course I know him. He's Henry Ford, AKA, the oil magnate.
sentences.cn: 我当然知道这个人. 他是亨利?福特, 人称石油大王.

sentences.en: Retail magnate Philip Green comes in 107 th with $ 8.4 bn.
sentences.cn: 零售业巨头飞利浦·格林以84亿美元排名107位.

sentences.en: She rang up a press magnate and the Home Secretary , both personal friends of hers.
sentences.cn: 她给一位报界巨头和内政部长打过电话, 两位都是他的私人朋友.

sentences.en: That did not make him the top - paid auto magnate by any means.
sentences.cn: 不过这绝不是说,他就可以算得上收入最高的汽车大亨.

sentences.en: The newspaper was owned by a famous publishing magnate.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸为一位著名的出版业巨头所有。

sentences.en: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
sentences.cn: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

words.tran_cn: 巨头；大资本家；要人；富豪；……大王

trans.tran_cn: 富豪，权贵，巨头，大资本家
trans.tran_en: a rich and powerful person in industry or business
